Represents a square shaped board sub class of Board allowing 2 or 4 players.

StarBoard - Class in chinesecheckers.ui
Represents a 6 corner star shaped board sub class of Board allowing 2, 4 or 6 players.
StarBoard(ArrayList<Player>, Theme, boolean) - Constructor for class chinesecheckers.ui.StarBoard
Creates a star shaped board for 2, 4 or 6 players.
